entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:28 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow or rain mixed with freezing rain beginning early in the morning then changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle later in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:27 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
